post:
Howdy,

Yezhost team is really pleased to be able to offer SSD VPS with FREE PLESK LICENSE.

Our concept is simple: Quality, Low-Cost, Phoenix KVM VPS using SuperFast SSD RAID10 disk storage and enterprise-class Intel Xeon Processors.

Our network is monitored 24/7 and our servers are located in Phoenix, US.

Test File: https://www.yezhost.com/about-us/phoenix-data-center/
Plans Page: https://www.yezhost.com/vps-hosting/

**VM-512MB**
Dedicated RAM: 512MB
Storage: 10 GB SSD RAID10
vCPU Cores: 1 CPU
Bandwidth: 4TB
1 Static IPv4 Address
1Gbps Uplink Port
Price per month: $5.00 (yearly), $7.95 otherwise
[DEPLOY NOW](http://www.yezhost.com/vps-hosting)

All orders (that aren't marked as fraud) are set up instantly. Customers also have full control of their VPS via the [Kloud](http://www.yezhost.com/kloud) (in-built system) control panel.

Support is available via our Friendly Live Chat Support service on our website, or via usual support tickets in the customer portal.

**[Read our customer reviews www.serchen.co.uk/company/yezhost/](http://www.serchen.co.uk/company/yezhost/)**

**We also offer a 14-day money back guarantee, so you've got nothing to lose! **

To order your VPS today, please visit https://www.yezhost.com/

If anyone has any questions, please feel free to ask.
